General.Name: Global Tech Industries Group Inc
General.Description: Global Tech Industries Group, Inc. operates an online cryptocurrency trading platform in the United States. The company operates Beyond Blockchain, a cryptocurrency trading platform, which allows multi-currency clearing and direct settlements in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Bitcoin SV, Aave, Compound, Uniswap, Chainlink, and Yearn Finance. The company was formerly known as Tree Top Industries, Inc. and changed its name to Global Tech Industries Group, Inc. in July 2016. Global Tech Industries Group, Inc. was founded in 1980 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 511 Sixth Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10011
